name: The Last Tree (itch) (CyanidePanda)
description:
Defend the last tree from the evil goblins!

Using your trusty apple cannon, protect the last tree by knocking goblins unconscious and building turrets to help keep the tree alive!

Player Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Fire

RMB - Suck up apples

In order to buy a turret click the turret icon in the bottom left, and when the object highlights green you can place it, right clicking resets this and allows the player to shoot again.

I hope you enjoy the game!

Thanks,

Adam
